page.title: 12PEOPLE WHO LIVE IN N.FAREHAM
page.content: These are some people who live and work in the area:{ {Post Office Owner,Funtley Village. She has lived there since February 1985.The shop is open from 9 till 5, they don't get much post compared to other post offices,but do quite well selling vegetables.The best day for selling things was Friday. {A Nurse She has lived in Fareham for 3 years and works at Knowle Hospital.She uses the footpath from Funtley to the hospital as a short cut to and from work.She likes the pleasant walk after and before work. {A Farmer,Dean Farm. He liked living in the area because it was near the sea and he did not feel isolated,with Fareham Town Centre only 20 minutes walk away.
